submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, a: List[int], b: List[int]) -> int:
        assert len(a) == m - 1
        assert len(b) == n - 1
        a = sorted(a, reverse=True)
        b = sorted(b, reverse=True)
        n = len(a)
        m = len(b)
        i, j = 0, 0
        ans = 0
        while i < n or j < m:
            if i < n and (j >= m or a[i] >= b[j]):
                ans += (j + 1) * a[i]
                i += 1
            else:
                ans += (i + 1) * b[j]
                j += 1
        return ans
